title: Create duplicate component and update import in PlayerAggregateStatsPage

requirements.text: Create a new file frontend/src/components/apa/MatchupAnalysisDropdownPlayerStats.tsx that is an exact copy of the existing frontend/src/components/apa/MatchupAnalysisDropdown.tsx with no modifications

quotes:
Create a new file (copy-paste exact contents)

NEW FILE
frontend/src/components/apa/MatchupAnalysisDropdownPlayerStats.tsx

Contents: copy the entire MatchupAnalysisDropdown.tsx you pasted (unchanged for now).

acceptanceCriteria: The new file contains identical code to MatchupAnalysisDropdown.tsx

requirements.text: In frontend/src/pages/players/PlayerAggregateStatsPage.tsx, change the import statement from "import MatchupAnalysisDropdown from '../../components/apa/MatchupAnalysisDropdown';" to "import MatchupAnalysisDropdown from '../../components/apa/MatchupAnalysisDropdownPlayerStats';" with no other code changes

quotes:
Change ONLY the import in PlayerAggregateStatsPage

In:
frontend/src/pages/players/PlayerAggregateStatsPage.tsx

Replace:

import MatchupAnalysisDropdown from '../../components/apa/MatchupAnalysisDropdown';

With:

import MatchupAnalysisDropdown from '../../components/apa/MatchupAnalysisDropdownPlayerStats';

acceptanceCriteria: PlayerAggregateStatsPage.tsx imports from MatchupAnalysisDropdownPlayerStats instead of MatchupAnalysisDropdown
No other changes are made to PlayerAggregateStatsPage.tsx

constraints: Do not modify any code in MatchupAnalysisDropdown.tsx
Do not modify any code in PlayerAggregateStatsPage.tsx except the single import statement
The new MatchupAnalysisDropdownPlayerStats.tsx must be identical to MatchupAnalysisDropdown.tsx
nonGoals: Changing the behavior of the matchup analysis dropdown
Modifying any other imports or code in PlayerAggregateStatsPage.tsx
Updating any other files that use MatchupAnalysisDropdown
